title: W2SZ • All posts by "ac2yd ben" tag

items.title: AC2YD - Ben Cahill
items.content_html:
I was the equipment manager for W2SZ for at least one year, probably 1975-76 school year. I graduated one semester early, in December ‘76 (class of ‘77), so I probably was not equipment manager for 76-77 school year. I carried on the traditional report, “Some of the equipment is working, and some of it isn’t”, that my predecessor passed down to me! I can’t remember his name. :-(

At the time, I was WB2PWS (advanced class). I let my license drop after college, just got re-licensed in late 2018 as Extra, back on the air in 2020 … built Softrock RXTX Ensemble kit, been happily QRP CW ever since … largely contesting!
